articles.author: Jonathan Landay, Aram Roston
articles.description: A proposal seen by Reuters and bearing the name of a controversial U.S.-backed aid group described a plan to build large-scale camps called “Humanitarian Transit Areas” inside - and possibly outside - Gaza to house the Palestinian population, outlining a vision of "replacing Hamas' control over the population in Gaza."
articles.title: Exclusive: Proposal outlines large-scale 'Humanitarian Transit Areas' for Palestinians in Gaza
